model

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a room in the clinic with a pet and his record
    Author:
    Mateo Valdes

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String n,
            Pet cpt,
            Record rc,
            boolean a)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        n - The name of the room
        cpt - The current pet in the room
        rc - The current record in the room
        a - The availability of the room

    • Method Detail

      • fillRoom

        public void fillRoom(Pet cpt,
                     Owner own,
                     int day,
                     int month,
                     int year,
                     java.lang.String symptoms,
                     java.lang.String diagnosis)
        Fill the room with a pet given the attributes and create a new record for the pet

        post: A new pet is added to the room
        post: A new record is added to the room
        post: The room is not longer available

        Parameters:
        cpt - The current pet
        own - The pet's owner
        day - The current day of the month
        month - The current month
        year - The current year
        symptoms - The pet's symptoms
        diagnosis - The pet's diagnosis

      • calculateCost

        public double calculateCost(int day,
                            int month,
                            int year)
        Calculates the cost of the pet's hospitalization
        Parameters:
        day - Current day of the month
        month - Current month
        year - Current year
        Returns:
        A double with the cost of the pet's hospitalization

      • releasePet

        public void releasePet()
        Releases the current pet

        post: The pet is released from the room

      • addNewMedication

        public java.lang.String addNewMedication(java.lang.String name,
                                         double dose,
                                         double cost,
                                         double frequency)
        Description This method allows to add new medicines that were prescription during the hospitalization at the patient stories.

        pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
        post: New medicines were added to the patient clinic story.

        Parameters:
        name - The medicine name. This param must be not null.
        dose - The medicine dose, this param refers to the amount of medicine supplied to the pet each time according the frequence assigned.
        cost - The medicine cost by each dose. This param could be empty.
        frequency - The frequency of medicine application. This param could be empty.
        Returns:
        A message that indiques if medicine was added to the patient clinic story

      • addNewDiagnosis

        public void addNewDiagnosis(java.lang.String newDiagnosis)
        Description This method allows to add new notes to the possible diagnostic during the hospitalization at the patient stories.

        pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
        post: New notes were added to the possible diagnostic in the patient clinic story.

        Parameters:
        newDiagnosis - The notes of possible diagnostic. This param must be not null.

      • addNewSymptom

        public void addNewSymptom(java.lang.String newSymptom)
        Description This method allows to add a new symptom presented during the hospitalization at the patient stories.

        pre: The patient clinic story must be not null.
        post: New notes were added to the possible diagnostic in the patient clinic story.

        Parameters:
        newSymptom - The new symptoms. This param must be not null.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the room
        Returns:
        The name of the room

      • getCurrentPet

        public Pet getCurrentPet()
        The current pet that is hospitalized in the room. If there is no pet in the room, returns null
        Returns:
        The current pet in the room

      • getRecord

        public Record getRecord()
        The medical record of the pet currently hospitalized in the room If there is no pet hospitalized then there is no record, and this function returns null
        Returns:
        The medical record the pet currently hospitalized in the room

      • getAvailable

        public boolean getAvailable()
        Returns a boolean representing whether the room is available (i.e. not occupied by a pet).
        Returns:
        A boolean representing whether the room is available
